name: Pig Wing
description:
Pig got a wing!
(It looks like a bat. But it is not.)

In the pyramid, a pig finds wings. All he has to do is find a way out. But, of course, there are traps and guardians. Normally, It is impossible to exit. But, now, there is no problem. Because the pig got wings! Let's make it to the end!

- 10 easy peasy stages +
15 a little bit hard stages +
5 ridiculously annoying stages +
1 secret stage that will make you want to throw the phone
- 2 secret rooms and 2 hidden items that you don't know where to use
- 2 mysterious pigs
- Endless mode you can brag your score to Social Network
- Many traps and guardians in pig's way
- And 2 wings
